name: airter
description: AiTer - A terminal client optimized for AI CLI collaboration
copyright: Copyright © 2025-2026 Within-7.com - 任小姐出海战略咨询

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && electron-builder && node scripts/generate-release.js
scripts.build:mac: tsc && vite build && electron-builder --mac && node scripts/generate-release.js
scripts.build:win: tsc && vite build && electron-builder --win && node scripts/generate-release.js
scripts.build:all: tsc && vite build && electron-builder --mac --win && node scripts/generate-release.js
scripts.build:internal: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js internal && npm run build
scripts.build:internal:mac: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js internal && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:internal:win: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js internal && npm run build:win
scripts.build:internal:all: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js internal && npm run build:all
scripts.build:public: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js public && npm run build
scripts.build:public:mac: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js public && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:public:win: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js public && npm run build:win
scripts.build:public:all: node scripts/switch-builtin-plugins.js public && npm run build:all
